articles.title: Burkina Faso refuses to take deportees as US stops issuing visas - BBC
articles.description: The West African nation's foreign minister asks if the decision led to the US suspending issuing visas.
articles.content:
Burkina Faso's military government has refused to take in deportees from the US as Washington suspended issuing visas in the West African nation.
Minister of Foreign Affairs Karamoko Jean-Marie Trao… [+2217 chars]
